sense.name: Make a written representation of speech.
sense.examples: Transcribe the oral history of the tribe. The anthropologist transcribed the sentences in IPA She made great efforts to transcribe all her class notes. I really need to transcribe this data. While she was transcribing sentences, I wrote the discussion.

sense.name: Rewrite in a different script.
sense.examples: The Sanskrit text was transcribed into Bengali. We transcribed the Hebrew into Roman characters.

sense.name: Rewrite or arrange a piece of music.
sense.examples: My teacher transcribed a violin piece for piano. I tried to transcribe Journey for a single acoustic guitar.

sense.name: Convert the genetic information in a strand of DNA into a strand of RNA.
sense.examples: We spent the whole class trying to transcribe DNA. Scientists often transcribe DNA into RNA.
